refnamediv.refpurpose: Provides access to the disnix-service through the D-Bus interface

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command disnix-client provides access to a disnix-service instance running on the same machine by connecting to the D-Bus system or session bus. In most cases this tool is only needed for debugging purposes, since it only uses the D-Bus protocol and cannot connect to a remote machine. A more useful client for use in production environments is: disnix-ssh-client.
